background: This is a diet optimization problem involving the selection of a set of foods that meet nutritional needs within specified ranges while minimizing total cost.

parameters.definition: The cost of each food item
The minimum quantity of each food that can be bought
The maximum quantity of each food that can be bought
The minimum required quantity of each nutrient
The maximum allowed quantity of each nutrient
The amount of each nutrient in each food

constraints.description: Each food's purchased amount should be no less than its minimum required amount
For each food j, the amount bought must be less than or equal to FoodMax_j
constraints.code:
FoodCount = len(FoodMax)  # This line is added to define FoodCount
AmountFood = model.addVars(FoodCount, vtype=gp.GRB.CONTINUOUS, name="AmountFood")

constraints.description: Each nutrient's total amount from all foods must be greater than or equal to the minimum required quantity for that nutrient
constraints.code:
# Add constraints to ensure each nutrient's total amount from all foods is greater or equal to the minimum required
for i in range(NutrientCount):
    model.addConstr(gp.quicksum(AmountNutrient[j, i] * AmountFood[j] for j in range(FoodCount)) >= NutrientMin[i], 
                    name=f"nutrient_min_req_{i}")

constraints.description: Total nutrient intake from the selected foods must not exceed the maximum allowed quantity for each nutrient
constraints.code:
# Add maximum nutrient intake constraints
for i in range(NutrientCount):
    model.addConstr(gp.quicksum(AmountNutrient[j, i] * AmountFood[j] for j in range(FoodCount)) <= NutrientMax[i], 
                    name="max_nutrient_{}".format(i))

constraints.description: All food quantities must be non-negative.
Ensure that the amount of nutrient j from all foods i is at least the minimum required quantity of nutrient j
constraints.code:
# Ensure that the amount of nutrient j from all foods i is at least the minimum required quantity of nutrient j
for j in range(NutrientCount):
    model.addConstr(gp.quicksum(AmountNutrient[i, j] * AmountFood[i] for i in range(FoodCount)) >= NutrientMin[j], 
                    name=f"min_nutrient_{j}")

constraints.description: Ensure that the amount of nutrient j from all foods i does not exceed the maximum allowed quantity of nutrient j
constraints.code:
# Ensure that the amount of nutrient j from all foods i does not exceed the maximum allowed quantity of nutrient j
for j in range(NutrientCount):
    model.addConstr(gp.quicksum(AmountNutrient[i, j] * AmountFood[i] for i in range(FoodCount)) <= NutrientMax[j], 
                    name=f"nutrient_max_{j}")

constraints.description: Ensure that the amount of each food i bought is at least the minimum quantity allowed for that food
Ensure that the amount of each food i bought does not exceed the maximum quantity allowed for that food

variables.definition: The amount of each food that is bought

objective.description: Minimize the total cost of buying foods
